channel.title: Inspiration on Infinite Walk

item.title: If There is Something to Desire, there will be something to regret
item.description: These lines are important to me. Most often or not, I find myself in a position where I say yes to things I shouldn’t. And I learnt the hard way that, when you’re saying “yes” to someone, make sure you’re not saying “no” to yourself. Download this poem as image, text, or pdf.
